content: Allan…yo bad! Yep , I said it. This is the most deliciously delicate piece of shitschtick I’ve had the pleasure of salivating over…. by you to date. I agree with one of your other responders; Someone needs to alert SNL about your talent. Keep it coming Allan. If it weren’t for Dumbledore in the WH, you may not have had your greatest writing moments. I’m almost sorry the midterm election results may water down your ammo. ( Hopefully, you will find another humorously vicious target by then.) Never stop dumping on the trumping. Grateful for your satire, Valorie Orr Sanders
